Convert any PDF document into Figma designs. 100% PRIVATELY.


Import your PDF into Figma as designs with fully-editable layers, or as pixel-perfect images.

All PDF files are kept 100% private on your local machine and never sent to any server. We never see your documents.


How to import a PDF into Figma (and edit it):

  1. Drag-and-drop or upload your PDF into pdf.to.design.
  2. Select how you want to import your PDF: as editable layers or static images.
  3. In a few seconds your PDF will be converted into editable Figma designs!


Why use pdf.to.design?

  1. Extract images and text from your PDFs and get them straight into Figma.
  2. Collaborate on PDF documents with your team in Figma.
  3. Use PDFs as templates for new designs in Figma.
  4. And much more!


Key features

  1. Convert PDFs into fully-editable Figma layers
  2. Keep all documents 100% private
  3. Instantly replace missing fonts

plugins.name: Draw Connector
plugins.description:
Draw perfect orthogonal connectors between layers


Draw Connector is a premium Figma plugin with a limit of 5 free runs per Figma file. Unlock Draw Connector for a one-time fee of $39 per user.


  • Draw connectors that take the shortest possible path and the fewest possible 90Â° turns
  • Customize the edges to connect
  • Customize the connector terminals (to one of None, Circle, Arrow, or Orthogonal)
  • Offset the connector terminals
  • Set the stroke color, stroke width, stroke style (solid/dashed), corner radius, and margin
  • Auto-updates when the position or dimension of any connected layers change


Legacy users who had purchased a Draw Connector license key on Gumroad can still continue to use their license key to unlock the plugin.

plugins.name: Pixel Perfect
plugins.description:
Forgot to turn back on Snap to Pixel Grid? Not a problem. Select any layers you want to snap back to the pixel grid, and presto, their position and size are rounded back to nice round numbers.

How it works:
1. Select layers you'd like to apply Pixel Perfect to.
2. Pixel Perfect will run on all children of any selected frame or group, so you can simply select the top level frames.
3. Run the Plugin
4. Pixel Perfect will modify the position of size of each layer so its x/y position and width and height are on full pixels: 200 instead of 200.45
5. By default Pixel Perfect won't affect shape anchor points, but you can turn that feature on and Pixel Perfect will also move the anchor points of any shape path selected.

accepted.name: Idan Arbel
accepted.description: Owner of UX/UI Design studio based in Israel

plugins.name: Specs (formerly, EightShapes Specs)
plugins.description:
Documentation | Submit requests and defects | Slack community


Automate production of page and component design specifications (â€œspecsâ€) of selected components, instances and frames. The output is useful for design-dev handoff, auditing in progress design work, and critiquing with teammates.


Features available for free without payment include:


  1. Anatomy with marked layers and annotated dependencies, instance props and other unvarying attributes
  2. Props that compare attributes across variants to highlight differences and boolean prop layer visibility
  3. Layout and spacing of layers with autolayout, describing attributes and annotating artwork


Additional features available via an in-app upgrade include:


  1. Figma variables detection & display
  2. Modes section for variables that change across modes
  3. Two way comparisons of all variant combinations across two properties
  4. Tokens Studio tokens detection & display
  5. Annotation of all anatomy elements and layout configurations detected across all compared variants, not just the selected variant
  6. Custom spec formatting using color variables, spacing variables and text styles
  7. Specs of nested components automated, easing how to find and spec relevant components
  8. Tabular Anatomy display, including dev resources
  9. Multi-column layouts (2, 3 and 4 columns) for many sections
  10. Color format as hex or hsla
  11. Dark mode spec formatting


For billing support, contact Figma at support@figma.com. Since plugin upgrade is supported by the Figma Payment platform, the plugin author cannot help with billing inquiries and team and organization licensing is not available.


To get help, request a feature, report a defect or troubleshoot, visit the EightShapes Specs public Slack. You can also request a feature or submit a defect on the project's Github Issues page.


To learn more, get a copy of the EightShapes Specs community file and read the Medium articles The EightShapes Specs Figma Plugin and Component Specifications.


Made by @nathanacurtis of Directed Edges LLC.

plugins.name: Design Lint
plugins.description:
Find and fix errors in your designs.


Design Lint is a plugin that finds missing styles within your designs. It's perfect for fixing errors in your Design System or designs before handoff.


Because Design Lint doesn't try and manage your library, there's no logging in or signing up for accounts.


While it's running, Design Lint will update automatically as you fix errors.


  • Errors are displayed in a list by category, which can be filtered by type. This way solving errors in bulk is quick and easy.
  • A Layers View is available for more granular view into where errors are, great for design system components.
  • Use the "Select All" option to fix multiple errors at once.
  • Have a huge file? No problem, design lint can load pages with 10,000 layers in a few seconds.
  • Ignore and Ignore All allow you to ignore special unique layers.
  • Have an illustration in your design? Use the "Lock" layer feature in figma to skip it from being linted.
  • Want to set your own border radius values? Open the settings panel in the plugin.
  • Use the refresh icon in the top corner to run the linter again on a new selection.


Have a feature request or question? Send me a DM on twitter.

accepted.name: Daniel Destefanis
accepted.description:
Design at @figma
Prev design at @discord

Creator of a few figma plugins, musician,  and most importantly a dad.

plugins.name: Text to Design - AI Assistant
plugins.description:
Unleash Your Full Design Potential: Become a 10X Designer Today


As a designer, you face challenges every day â€“ from translating complex ideas into visuals to meeting tight deadlines. It's a constant struggle to stay innovative while also being efficient. That's where our game-changing Figma plugin comes in, designed to transform your workflow and unleash your full creative power.


Text-to-Design: Just tell our AI Assistant what you need, and our AI will bring your ideas to life in Figma. From intricate product cards and vibrant hero sections to full-fledged landing pages and dashboards â€“ see your vision materialize with precision and flair.


Image-to-Design: Transform any image into a professional design in moments. Attach screenshots, sketches, or wireframes and watch as they morph into polished, ready-to-use designs. Experience the real-time magic of AI.

plugins.name: Roto

plugins.name: Emailify HTML Email Builder
plugins.description:
Please Note: Emailify does not support converting Figma email designs that were created manually outside of the plugin. If you already have a Figma email designed, you'll need to redesign it using Emailify before exporting it to HTML.


Documentation & Video Tutorials


For plugin documentation and step by step video tutorials, please visit https://docs.hypermatic.com/emailify


Questions & Support


Emailify is still a baby panda, so if you notice any bugs or have any questions about the plugin, please get in touch directly via https://hypermatic.com/contact and we'll help you troubleshoot and resolve them as quickly as possible.


Security


Emailify is designed to be privacy and security focused â€” for details about security and how the plugin works, please visit https://docs.hypermatic.com/emailify/security


Features


  1. Quickly design emails using dozens of included common components.
  2. Build out your own custom re-usable Figma component library using the included design tools.
  3. Includes 100+ free professionally designed Emailify-ready Figma templates for inspiration.
  4. Customise your text, images, styles and auto-layout settings with Figma.
  5. Easily specify responsive design overrides (per layer) for mobile.
  6. Translate and localize your Figma email designs via Excel (XLSX) file export/import, or using the Lokalise API or Crowdin API, with optional Markdown formatting.
  7. Dark mode previews with custom color overrides and image swaps (for supported clients).
  8. Supports exporting animated GIFs from Figma layers in email designs.
  9. Preview your real HTML email at different device sizes directly inside the plugin.
  10. Supports Google font and custom font embeds (with configureable web safe fallbacks for unsupported clients).
  11. Easily design and export HTML email signatures
  12. No coding required; export responsive, production ready HTML with one-click.
  13. Built-in Integrations for 30+ email marketing platforms (eg. MailChimp, Klaviyo, HubSpot, Salesforce etc).
  14. Automatically generates a preview page with all of your HTML emails.
  15. Optionally export developer friendly MJML source code.
  16. Export HTML emails to PDFs (with optional "wireframe mode") for sending to clients for approvals.
  17. Optionally self-host images on your own Cloud Storage bucket (eg. AWS S3, Backblaze B2, Cloudflare R2, etc).
  18. Download the exported .zip file to your computer from Figma.


Design at the speed of light, with dozens of included common components.

Quickly build out a design by instantly adding common component layouts to your email with one click.


Customize the design and content for your own brand using Figma.

Add your own styles and content using Figma to build out your own re-useable library of Figma components for Emailify.


Preview your live responsive HTML email in Figma and add mobile overrides.

Easily add mobile overrides and HTML properties (links, alt text etc) to a selected layer to avoid manually adding CSS and HTML in code.


Translate your email designs with built-in localization.

Easily translate and localize your Figma email designs via Excel (XLSX) file export/import, or the built-in Lokalise platform integration.


Automatically export responsive HTML emails from Figma, in seconds.

No coding required. Export your email designs from Figma to production ready, responsive HTML email code in seconds, with one click.


Integrations with Klaviyo, MailChimp, HubSpot, Salesforce and 30+ more.

Automatically export your HTML templates from Emailify for Klaviyo, MailChimp, Campaign Monitor, SendGrid, PostMark, HubSpot, ActiveCampaign, Salesforce Marketing Cloud, Pardot, Braze, Bazaarvoice, Iterable, OneSignal, Omnisend, Ongage, Dotdigital, MailJet, Intercom, Zoho Campaigns, Customer.io, Brevo (Sendinblue), Mailgun, SendPulse, Selzy, Stripo, MailerLite, EmailOctopus, Loops.so, GetResponse, ConvertKit, Constant Contact, Drip, SugarCRM, Shopify, Aweber, Benchmark Email, Insider, Moosend, SendX, Mailercloud, Bloomreach, Amazon SES (AWS), Sendwithus, Emarsys, Contlo, Spotler, Blueshift, Yotpo, Bento, Cheetah Digital by Marigold, Zeta, Netlify, PDF, or Email on Acid.


Export emails that look great (even in Outlook).

Export designs from Figma to HTML emails that have been tested in the most popular email clients, including Outlook.


Emailify Pro


10 free trials of Emailify Pro are included with the free version, and if you're a casual user, you can continue using the free version of Emailify forever.


If you're a power user, you can optionally upgrade to continue using all the extra features that are only available in the pro version of Emailify.


To learn more about Emailify Pro, please visit https://www.hypermatic.com/emailify/#pro

accepted.description: Never send a human to do a machine's job. Spend less time crying, and more time designing.

plugins.name: Clean Document
plugins.description:
Automagically organize and clean up your Figma document.


Fund my work on Figma plugins â†’


Delete Hidden Layers

Deletes all hidden layers within the selection or on the current page.


Ungroup Single-Layer Groups

Ungroups single-layer groups within the selection or on the current page that have no background, blend mode, effect or export setting.


Make Pixel-Perfect

Rounds the X and Y position and dimensions of layers within the selection or on the current page to the nearest pixel.


Smart Rename Layers

Intelligently renames layers within the selection or on the current page.

  1. Layers of type Text will be named based on their text content.
  2. Layers of type Instance will be given the same name as their Main Component.
  3. Layers of all other layer types will be named based on their layer type. (For example, a layer of type Rectangle will be named â€œRectangleâ€, a layer of type Group will be named â€œGroupâ€, and so on.)
  4. Layers with export settings will not be renamed.

Optionally specify a Regular Expression to skip the renaming of particular layers.


Smart Sort Layers

Sort layers within the selection or on the current page by their X and Y position while maintaining their relative stacking order on the page.


Clean Layers

Run all the above commands on layers within the selection or on the current page. Optionally skip processing of Locked layers.


Sort Pages

Sorts pages of the current document in alphabetical order.


Reset Plugin

Resets all settings to their defaults.
plugins.tagline: Automagically organize and clean up your Figma document

plugins.name: Figma Chat
plugins.description:
This plugin helps you to interact inside your files with other peoples.

It's a simple chat with the ability to send text and the current selections of frames or other elements. Just select the elements you want to send to other people and tick the checkbox.


How to use?


First of all, open the "Figma Chat" plugin inside your file.

The plugin generates a random room name and a secret key. These two strings are available to all editors inside the file.


The room name: This string is used to let the server know where to send the messages to.

The secret key: This string is used to en- and decrypt all messages.


The plugin handles all the stuff for you!


At the bottom of the plugin you can enter the user list and access the "Settings" page. Set an avatar and the color and if you want a custom server (https://github.com/ph1p/figma-chat).


An important function is to send your current selection. You can easily do this by selecting one or more elements and clicking the element that appears inside the chat bar.


MY CHAT DOES NOT START :o


If this is the case, please use the "reset" button. This will reset all data an generates new keys for you :)


---


Always note: All messages are encrypted and can only be read by people who are able to run plugins inside your file.

Feel free to write me if you have any problems or feedback (:

Please use the GitHub Issues (https://github.com/ph1p/figma-chat/issues) or follow me on twitter and write me a DM https://twitter.com/phlp_

accepted.name: Philip
accepted.description: ðŸ¥¸

plugins.name: Glassmorphism
plugins.description:
This plugin enables you to preview the effect in real-time directly within the canvas.


Glassmorphism is a popular design trend in user interface (UI) design that creates a frosted glass effect on elements such as buttons, panels, and cards. This effect is achieved by using blurred, semi-transparent backgrounds overlaid with elements that appear to be floating above the background. The result is a visually appealing, three-dimensional effect that creates a sense of depth and transparency in the UI design. Glassmorphism has gained popularity in recent years as it adds a modern, sleek look to UI designs.

accepted.name: offbit.engineering
accepted.description: offbit.engineering is a collective of designers and programmers who want to make the web a more beautiful place.

plugins.tagline: Add a sense of depth and texture to your designs.

plugins.name: iMockup
plugins.description:
About iMockup Device Generator


iMockup is the simplest way to create device mockups to showcase app UI. 


Getting started:

  1. Install and run the plugin
  2. Select your device: Choose from the latest phones such as iPhone 15 Pro Max and Google Pixel 8 Pro 
  3. Customise everything: Pick your device angle, tweak color, add shadows. Drag and drop your screenshots to embed them into the device.
  4. Export to Figma: As a transparent PNG in 4K res.
  5. Post-process in Figma: Rotate or scale your exported device mockup to an appropriate size and angle.


About

Powered by iMockup.pro: a device mockup generator for creating device mockups. Try iMockup online.


License

All free exports are created under the CC 4.0 License. You must include a link to iMockup.pro as a source for the mockups, wherever device mockups are used. If you donâ€™t want to attribute, upgrade to a standard license.

plugins.name: Pixels
plugins.description:
Apply Pixelate / 8bit Effect Filter on images. Raster & Vector.


________


1. How does it work ?


â€¢ select one (or many) shape with an image fill

â€¢ use slider to set sample size value (it starts with a 16x16 pixel grid size)

â€¢ click on "Apply"

â€¢ a new Pixelate fill is added to your shape


tip : you can edit min, max and current Slider values.


________


2. Vector mode :


â€¢ select one shape (only) with an image fill

â€¢ use the slider to set the sample size value

â€¢ click on "Vectorize"

â€¢ a new group, filled with rectangles representing the pixels, is added to the page


note : "Vectorizing" an image can take time, so there is a limit of 20 000 blocks (depending on image and sample size)

plugins.name: AI Image Upscaler
plugins.description:
This plugin uses AI to upscale up to 8X the original resolution. Perfect for a variety of images including avatars, background images, Midjourney renders, marketing images, and designs. Works for JPGs and transparent PNGs.


Up to 8X and 4K (Pro required)

The AI Image Upscaler makes your images look better even when you make them bigger. It can make images up to 8X bigger or up to 4K resolution without losing quality.


Face Enhance

The Face Enhance feature works on portrait images. It uses AI to find and enhance facial features and remove imperfections.


Free for 2X and 2K

This Figma plugin lets you make images 2X bigger and up to 2K resolution for free. The API costs money so it's unrealistic to offer this plugin 100% free.


Pro License

If you want to use the 8X upscale and 4K resolution features, you can buy a one-time license.

plugins.name: Shapes
plugins.description:
This is a set of basic shapes.


  • Select the shape type you want to create.
  • Click "Create" button to add the shape onto the canvas.
  • Adjust the parameters in the plugin window to modify the shapes.


Currently supported shapes:

  • Cube
  • Rounded cube
  • Cylinder
  • Rectangular window
  • Tri prism
  • Rhombus
  • Stair


Pro tips:

  • Scroll above the parameter input component to adjust the parameters more efficiently, with or without holding the shift key.
  • Drag move the input component's label to adjust quickly.
  • Press ArrowUp and ArrowDown while focusing the input component to change the parameters by 1. Press while holding shift to change by 10.


Ps: here is a playground tutorial file for this plugin.


This plugin shares 7 days + 10 times free uses with Fast Isometric plugin. After that, you'll need a license from Gumroad to access pro features.
plugins.tagline: A superset of Figma basic shapes.

Typography is essential part of any design project. Your choice of typeface is as important as what you do with it. The right font can transform your project, breathing life into your ideas. But finding that perfect typeface? That's where Font Replacer Ultimate comes in â€“ not just a helper, but your partner in creative excellence!


Font Replacer Ultimate is Figma plugin built to swap, change and replace font in any type of designs in one click. For revitalizing your brand's image, streamlining design elements, ensuring consistent text style application, and beyond. Plugin is built to use both for Figma design files and for FigJam boards.


Get license key


Latest Plugin API updates and algorithms implemented in this plugin help to gain high performance with full control over replacement process.


No project is too big or too small. Whether it's a few artboards or thousands of text layers, you can swap fonts with one of these scopes: on selection, on current page or on whole Figma file, where you launched the plugin.


Mixed font styles are also fully supported!

plugins.description:
Both Variables and Styles are supported now! Link values used in your design file to all types of styles and variables easily!


Styles and Variables Organizer is your most handy tool for:

  1. Design system management
  2. Daily design tokens implementation
  3. Legacy design files clean up
  4. Applying newly added variables/styles to the entire file.


Features:

  1. Usage assessment by variable modes
  2. Merge and link values used to the selected style or variable
  3. Select all elements using the same value/style or variable
  4. Filter variable modes and properties easily
  5. Automatically merge all available styles/variables with a single click!


Examples of what you can do:

  1. Link all the same color in the file to a color variable
  2. Link all corner radius values in the file to number variables
  3. Merge different styles with the same value to a single one
  4. Use your imagination...


Supported types:

  1. Color Variables
  2. Number Variables
  3. String Variables
  4. Color Styles
  5. Text Styles
  6. Effect Styles


Feel free to leave your comments and suggestions below, DM me on twitter(X), or email us.

plugins.name: CopyDoc Text Kit
plugins.description:
Documentation & Video Tutorials


For plugin documentation and step by step video tutorials, please visit https://docs.hypermatic.com/copydoc


Questions & Support


CopyDoc is still a baby panda, so if you notice any bugs or have any questions about the plugin, please get in touch directly via https://hypermatic.com/contact and we'll help you troubleshoot and resolve them as quickly as possible.


Security


CopyDoc is designed to be privacy and security focused â€” for details about security and how the plugin works, please visit https://docs.hypermatic.com/copydoc/security


Features


  1. Privacy focused â€” no data or content ever leaves your Figma file.
  2. Export Figma text layers to XLSX, DOCX, CSV, Markdown and JSON files directly to your computer.
  3. Bulk update Figma text layers via XLSX, DOCX, CSV, Markdown or JSON import directly from your computer.
  4. Create a custom content library inside your Figma file, with optional Google Sheets, Airtable and Figma Variable integrations.
  5. Sync repeating text/image content or CSS styles from a Google Sheet or XLSX/CSV file.
  6. Automatically generate Figma data tables from a Google Sheet or XLSX/CSV.
  7. Seamless design Localizations via simple Spreadsheet or XLIFF export/import.
  8. Find & Replace feature to quickly update any matching text.
  9. Automatically generate Charts by adding your own spreadsheet data.
  10. Export frames to DOCX, XLSX, TXT, EPUB, HTML or PDF.
  11. Quickly export selected text layers to XLSX, DOCX, CSV, Markdown, JSON or XLIFF files.
  12. Spell check your Figma text in dozens of languages.
  13. Download all Figma comments to CSV and JSON files.
  14. Include design references for text and comment exports.


Batch export/import Figma text content with one click.

Export every text layer in your design to Excel (XLSX), CSV, DOCX, Markdown or JSON files with one click, then instantly re-import any updated text content from the edited file back into Figma.


Privacy and security focused â€” nothing ever leaves your Figma file.

CopyDoc doesnâ€™t upload, store or process any Figma data outside of the plugin, everything happens securely inside your Figma file, and any exported files are downloaded directly to your computer.


Sync repeatable Figma layer text and image content from spreadsheets with one click.

Easily sync repeating text content (or layer names), image/video content or CSS styles to your Figma layers from any spreadsheet, or automatically generate a table in Figma â€” just drop an Excel (XLSX) file, CSV file or paste a Google Sheets or Airtable link.


Create your own text expander content library.

Easily create a content library directly inside CopyDoc with snippets expandable via '//' shortcuts or with one-click. Optionally extensible with Google Sheets, Figma Variables and Airtable integrations, and also includes a broad library of realistic placeholder data.


Seamless text localization with simple Excel, CSV, JSON or XLIFF files.

Export all your UX copy to a popular file format for text localization, add your translations outside of Figma, then instantly re-import and switch between or create new languages in your Figma designs.


Find and replace any text content in your Figma layers.

Quickly find and replace any text content in your Figma designs to save time manually changing the same word across all your layers..


Spell check and fix typos in Figma with one click.

Check your designs for embarrassing spelling mistakes (in dozens of languages) before exporting your text or sharing designs with stakeholders.


Export your Figma designs to popular document formats.

Export your Figma frames to Microsoft Word (.docx), Microsoft Excel (.xlsx), E-Book (.epub), Plain Text (.txt) or PDF files.


CopyDoc Pro


10 free trials of CopyDoc Pro are included with the free version, and if you're a casual user, you can continue using the free version of CopyDoc forever.


If you're a power user, you can optionally upgrade to continue using all the extra features that are only available in the pro version of CopyDoc.


To learn more about CopyDoc Pro, please visit https://www.hypermatic.com/copydoc/#pro

Export all your UX copy to a popular file format for text localization, add your translations outside of Figma, then instantly re-import and switch between or create new languages in your Figma designs.


Find and replace any text content in your Figma layers.

Quickly find and replace any text content in your Figma designs to save time manually changing the same word across all your layers..


Spell check and fix typos in Figma with one click.

Check your designs for embarrassing spelling mistakes (in dozens of languages) before exporting your text or sharing designs with stakeholders.


Export your Figma designs to popular document formats.

Export your Figma frames to Microsoft Word (.docx), Microsoft Excel (.xlsx), E-Book (.epub), Plain Text (.txt) or PDF files.


CopyDoc Pro


10 free trials of CopyDoc Pro are included with the free version, and if you're a casual user, you can continue using the free version of CopyDoc forever.


If you're a power user, you can optionally upgrade to continue using all the extra features that are only available in the pro version of CopyDoc.


To learn more about CopyDoc Pro, please visit https://www.hypermatic.com/copydoc/#pro

networkAccess.reasoning: CopyDoc queries hypermatic.com to validate licenses for Pro users and load assets to speed up plugin loading times. CopyDoc also queries figma.com to be able to export your Figma comments from the plugin. CopyDoc also queries gstatic.com to be able to render SVG Google Charts to your Figma file from the plugin.

136757.tagline: Everything you need to easily export, import, localize, spell check, and update Figma text

plugins.name: Color Blind
plugins.description:
Color Blind allows you to view your designs in the 8 different types of color vision deficiencies. 
All you need to do is make a selection and the plugin will clone it and create versions with the colors changed based on what each one would look like to a person with that type of color blindness. Each copy is contained within a group that is labelled with the color blindness type. 

You can also choose to only view certain types of color blindness by toggling the checkboxes in the plugin UI.

We currently don't support converting image layers.

plugins.name: SVG Export
plugins.description:
Save time exporting sets of SVGs by creating and assigning presets to optimize your exports. Works great for making icon libraries use clean and consistent SVG code. Optimization uses svgo (https://github.com/svg/svgo) under the hood.


  1. Reduce SVG file sizes
  2. See how options affect the code and appearance of icons in real time
  3. Use currentColor css property for icons that automatically inherit text color
  4. Use layer names as classes
  5. Create and manage presets for different types e.g. single color icons, illustrations, layers for animation
  6. Export to a .zip file or svg sprite sheet containing all of your selected layers
  7. Anyone on your team can see and modify presets on a file


Comes with 3 pre-made presets

  1. Default: Just reduces file size, shouldn't break anything.
  2. Monochrome: Strips out all fills and strokes, uses currentColor as fill on the SVG element.
  3. Layer Names -> Classes: Uses your layer names in Figma as classes in the SVG code.


Creating your own presets

  1. Click Edit presets
  2. Click the plus button in the top right
  3. Name and configure the options for your preset


Sharing presets

By default, all presets on a file can be seen and used by anyone with access to the file. Presets are saved on the file, so don't carry across if you create or edit a different file. To keep your presets, click the ... more icon in the presets panel and export your presets from one file, open up your new file, and choose the import presets option from the same menu.

accepted.name: Hamish
accepted.description: Hey I'm Hamish â€” a designer & developer working @Qwilr

plugins.tagline: Export tiny SVG files and control every aspect of how they're exported with presets. Powered by svgo

plugins.name: Custom Graph
plugins.description:
Custom Graph lets you build line, bar and cumulative graphs based on your design elements.


HOW TO BUILD A GRAPH:

  1. Select the frame in which you want to build the chart;
  2. Select an object in your design from which you want to build a graph;
  3. Enter data into the table (also supported in pasting from Excel and generating random numbers in the desired range).


FOLLOW THE LINK TO SEE ALL THE SETTINGS:

How to use the plug-in

Demo video with examples


Note: This plugin does not create coordinate axes to give maximum flexibility in plotting. You need to create coordinate axes yourself.
